main.name: Joshua Michalik
main.contactmessage: When you have a project or just an idea, reach out to me and I'd be happy to help you take the next steps.

resume.skillmessage: Web application and software developer experienced in not only in programming, but also in expert-led training and large-scale team management.

education.description: A once in a lifetime opportunity to be educated by the worldclass programmers bringing their A-game to future developers. We were taught a thorough foundation of object-oriented software development based in C# and JavaScript. During this course, we became familiar with everything from pseudocode and editors to SQL queries and HTTP requests, designing and building our own projects from the groundup day after day.

work.title: Senior UX God
work.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
